alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:44AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Morrill, southeastern Dawes and southeastern Sioux Counties through 715 AM MDT... At 643 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Box Butte Campground to 14 miles northwest of Lake Alice. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hemingford, Box Butte Campground, Kilpatrick Lake, Flahertys Corner, Box Butte Dam and Marsland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
